caption:
This photograph depicts an indoor office scene that gives the impression of a meeting or consultation. In the image, there are four individuals positioned within what appears to be a vintage, formal office setting. Starting from the left, the first two women are seated against the background of a large window covered with blinds. The first woman, sitting cross-legged, wears a dark coat and pants, while the second woman, also seated but with her legs crossed at the knees, wears a tan skirt and brown shoes, paired with a dark blazer.

In the center and right of the photograph, a man and another woman are positioned at a desk cluttered with papers and books. The man, seated in the middle, dons a dark suit and glasses and seems to be engaged in conversation or a meeting. Next to him, the young woman appears attentive to the discussion or perhaps to the documentation in front of her. 

The office is equipped with traditional elements including a wooden desk, bookshelves filled with binders and books, and a sideboard behind the seated individuals. There’s an American flag on the left and various posters and pictures adorning the walls. One notable poster says, “Be a good neighbor. Help the Red Cross help your good neighbor,” which suggests a community-focused theme or event. Additionally, a framed scenic painting hangs centrally on the wall, enhancing the room's formal ambiance. The lighting in the room is soft, likely provided by ceiling fixtures, casting a warm glow that complements the dated interior design.
title: Town selectmen's meeting in Rockport court house
